评论概述: Soft and comfy, fits true to size
评论详情: This top is made with polyester/rayon fabric which is soft, stretchy, and breathable. The pleats down the front give it a special touch. There are cuffs on the sleeves. I ordered my size based on the chart and it fits very well. It washed and dried nicely with no shrinkage, fading, or wrinkles. This will be a very nice top to wear on its own in cool weather or layered under a sweater or sweatshirt for cold winter days.

类型: Color: B2 Black Cyan PrintedSize: X-Large

类型: Color: B1 Soild Wine RedSize: Large
评论详情: This top is really cute.  It had detail pleating at the neckline downward to the midsection adding interest to a solid-colored top. The material is soft and drapes nicely. I like that it can be worn tucked into pants or a skirt or worn out with a pair of jeans. It's really a nice versatile top...a great addition to my wardrobe.

类型: Color: B2 Floral Pink WhiteSize: Small
评论详情: Written by my wife: I am petite, 5 ft tall, 125 lbs, 32D and size small in this top fits me well. I like the high neckline and the cuff on the sleeves keeps them from being too long on short arms. The pleating on the chest is nice too. The floral pink white design I ordered is very pretty. The fabric is comfortable and not see-through. I washed my top on gentle cycle and hung it to dry (because I baby my clothes) and it still looks brand new.

类型: Color: B2 Black Cyan PrintedSize: X-Large
评论详情: The color gradient is exactly as pictured and I love it!  The XL fit as I expected it would, based on the sizing chart provided.  I was worried the pleating at the top would look off or really cheap, but it does look very nice.  It adds some shape to the top, which I really like.  This will be an autumn essential in my closet when the cooler weather sets in.

I like this top a lot.  It is soft, comfortable and easy to wear.  I put it on right out of the package - no wrinkles!  I am a teacher, and always looking for comfortable easy care tops to wear to school without resorting to plain t-shirts.  This top looks a bit dressier and more professional, but would also be easy to pair with jeans.  I am a Boomer, 5'6", 145 lbs, usually a size 10.  I ordered the large and it was a perfect fit.  I like this one well enough that I think I'll order another color.

评论详情: This top is see-through and kind of thin, the material is soft and comfortable, and true to size, ordered my normal size and fits pretty well. The color and style is easily can matches most of the bottoms.

I am really pleased with this blouse. It’s hard to feel like you’re dressed nicely when most plus sized things look sporty or even ugly . This blouse is pretty and fits nicely, even though I have DDD bosom. I will be purchasing  more 3x for myself.I also ordered a small green floral for my granddaughter and she loves it, but added:The negative on this one is the details of the stitching.  The first photo shows inside the collar.  This second one shows the very front/top where the pleats meet the collar.  It’s kind of crooked.  I don’t know if others will notice it, but it’s not really professional quality.  And it does make me wonder if it will start to come apart after repeated washes and wears.All that being said, I really like it and think I’ll wear it

I wear a size medium. I am 5' tall and 140-145 lbs. I ordered medium and it fits me. I ordered in white and the color is as stated. The material is not fully see through but slightly, which is expected because it is white. I wear a lightweight moisture wicking sleeveless shirt under it. The threads are strong and the shirt arrived in good condition sealed in a package. The length isn't too long and the sleeves are slightly long but that's because I am a short person. It fits as expected. The material is soft. The material doesn't appear to be combed like a combed cotton blouse but I think it's decent and a shirt I will like wearing both to work, on the weekends and to church.
